name: The Muppets Movie Adventures
description:
LIGHTS, CAMERA, ACTION!
Join Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy, The Great Gonzo, Animal and more of the Muppets as the zany gang bring their unique blend of laughs, chaos and adventure to the Hollywood stage.
• Create movie magic as the Muppets star in their very own high seas, western, horror, fairy-tale and sci-fi blockbusters.
• Use the touchscreen and rear touch pad to solve puzzles and complete missions.
• Discover secret areas and hidden items – can you collect all the golden movie tickets, cinema reels and stars?
• Download additional movie adventures starring more of your favorite Muppets from PlayStation®Store.
1 player(s)
100KB Minimum
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
The Muppets Movie Adventures ©2014 Disney. Developed by Virtual Toys.
